attributes.action: Amend the The Debt Relief Order from £15,000 to £30,000
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
The Debt Relief Order currently aims to tackle the problems faced by a specific group of consumers who cannot obtain debt relief from any other source, be it Bankruptcy, IVA or a Debt Management Plan.
this is debts of £15,000 or less,
i propose this amount is amended to £30,000 or less.
